name: Lt. Gov. Tim Griffin
tweet: (5/5) I pray for the people of Ukraine as they bravely defend themselves against this unprovoked and unjust invasion.

name: Lt. Gov. Tim Griffin
tweet: (4/5) (4) personally sanction Russian oligarchs as well as Putin himself and work¬†with our¬†British friends to freeze the assets Russians have moved to London over the last two decades. If President Biden refuses to take further action, Congress should force his hand.

name: Lt. Gov. Tim Griffin
tweet: (3/5) We should (1) work to exclude Russia from the international financial transaction system, SWIFT (2) cripple Russia‚Äôs oil & gas + mineral & mining sectors with devastating sanctions, (3) immediately ramp up American energy production, including the #KeystoneXLPipeline, and..

name: Lt. Gov. Tim Griffin
tweet: (2/5) Russia‚Äôs unprovoked invasion of Ukraine is unacceptable. Instead of dancing around Vladimir Putin with a soft & ineffective response, President Biden should levy the strongest possible sanctions against Putin and the Russian economy.

name: Lt. Gov. Tim Griffin
